items.sentence: Tom was sitting on the couch with his arm around Mary.
Tom hasn\'t been home since he graduated from college.
I think it\'s time for me to consider going on a diet.
I think it\'s time for me to move into a smaller home.
I think it\'s time for me to split some more firewood.
Do you think Tom really intends to drop out of school?
Do you think Tom would be willing to babysit our kids?
There\'s a rumor going around that you two are dating.
This kind of plant grows only in the tropical regions.
I thought Tom would ask Mary to go with him to Boston.
